why.title: Why
why.beginning: In recent years, there has been a revolution in language technology and how we use our voice to communicate with technology. Icelandic is facing a challenge because of this fast technological changes as many of us already communicate with various devices in a foreign language.
why.middle: It is critical to change that and make sure that in the future we can communicate with technology in Icelandic, to make that happen work has begun on a large collaborative project in Icelandic language technology.
why.end: You can read more about Iceland's language technology project
